panels.description: Rate of fetch, scroll, and query requests by selected index.
panels.title: Request rate

panels.description: Latency of fetch, scroll, and query requests by selected index.

targets.expr:
avg by (job,opensearch_cluster,index) (
  increase(opensearch_index_search_fetch_time_seconds{job=~"$job",cluster=~"$cluster",opensearch_cluster=~"$opensearch_cluster",instance=~"$instance",index=~"$index", context="total"}[$__interval:] offset $__interval) / 
  clamp_min(increase(opensearch_index_search_fetch_count{job=~"$job",cluster=~"$cluster",opensearch_cluster=~"$opensearch_cluster",instance=~"$instance",index=~"$index", context="total"}[$__interval:] offset $__interval), 1)
)

avg by (job,opensearch_cluster,index) (
  increase(opensearch_index_search_scroll_time_seconds{job=~"$job",cluster=~"$cluster",opensearch_cluster=~"$opensearch_cluster",instance=~"$instance",index=~"$index", context="total"}[$__interval:] offset $__interval) / 
  clamp_min(increase(opensearch_index_search_scroll_count{job=~"$job",cluster=~"$cluster",opensearch_cluster=~"$opensearch_cluster",instance=~"$instance",index=~"$index", context="total"}[$__interval:] offset $__interval), 1)
)

panels.title: Request latency

panels.description: Ratio of query cache and request cache hits and misses.
panels.title: Cache hit ratio

panels.description: Total evictions count by cache type for the selected index.
panels.title: Evictions

panels.description: Rate of indexed documents for the selected index.
panels.title: Index rate

panels.description: Document indexing latency for the selected index.

targets.expr:
avg by(job,cluster,opensearch_cluster) (
  increase(opensearch_index_indexing_index_time_seconds{job=~"$job",cluster=~"$cluster",opensearch_cluster=~"$opensearch_cluster",instance=~"$instance",index=~"$index", context=~"total"}[$__interval:] offset $__interval) / 
  clamp_min(increase(opensearch_index_indexing_index_count{job=~"$job",cluster=~"$cluster",opensearch_cluster=~"$opensearch_cluster",instance=~"$instance",index=~"$index", context=~"total"}[$__interval:] offset $__interval), 1)
)

panels.title: Index latency

panels.description: Number of indexing failures for the selected index.
panels.title: Index failures

panels.description: Index flush latency for the selected index.

targets.expr:
avg by(job,cluster,opensearch_cluster,index) (
  increase(opensearch_index_flush_total_time_seconds{job=~"$job",cluster=~"$cluster",opensearch_cluster=~"$opensearch_cluster",instance=~"$instance",index=~"$index", context="total"}[$__interval:] offset $__interval) / 
  clamp_min(increase(opensearch_index_flush_total_count{job=~"$job",cluster=~"$cluster",opensearch_cluster=~"$opensearch_cluster",instance=~"$instance",index=~"$index", context="total"}[$__interval:] offset $__interval), 1)
)

panels.title: Flush latency

panels.description: Index merge time for the selected index.
panels.title: Merge time

panels.description: Index refresh latency for the selected index.

targets.expr:
avg by(job,opensearch_cluster,index) (
  increase(opensearch_index_refresh_total_time_seconds{job=~"$job",cluster=~"$cluster",opensearch_cluster=~"$opensearch_cluster",instance=~"$instance",index=~"$index", context="total"}[$__interval:] offset $__interval) / 
  clamp_min(increase(opensearch_index_refresh_total_count{job=~"$job",cluster=~"$cluster",opensearch_cluster=~"$opensearch_cluster",instance=~"$instance",index=~"$index", context="total"}[$__interval:] offset $__interval), 1)
)
